## Photobook spec checklist
- [ ] Changes affecting book structure reviewed against [docs/specs/photobook-structure-v1.md](../docs/specs/photobook-structure-v1.md)
- [ ] Preview and PDF remain deterministic (same picks/order/assets)
- [ ] Map/Gallery fallback behavior unchanged or spec updated
- [ ] New thresholds/caps documented in the spec
